Comment: So he is looking for the 4 move mate...to defend against this you either advance your pawn to f6 or your knight to f6
but not this!. ..Remember, the f7 pawn is the weakest pawn on the board and is often the subject of intense interest by your opponent
SO here, if you missed it so far, you have three options...p-f6, kn-f6 or bishop -e6
but not this, not this at all!
this was an unnecessary move because the game is over.
you are still not defending f6!!
and this is why you need to!
